entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
